¬†

THE ALMA SHOW | A PREMIER ARTISTIC JOURNEY CELEBRATING VIETNAMESE HERITAGE

1.¬†Alma Show

Alma Show is a cultural collaboration between Vietnamese and Korean artists, offering four performances daily, each with a capacity of up to 400 audience members.

This 70-minute performance is a stunning visual celebration of Vietnam‚Äôs Five Elements philosophy: Metal ‚Äì Wood ‚Äì Water ‚Äì Fire ‚Äì Earth. The rich variety of acts includes: magic, dance, water puppetry, special effects, flash mob, and √°o d√†i (Vietnamese traditional dress) showcases ‚Äì suitable for audiences of all ages.

The show opens with the Apsara dance ‚Äì a signature dance of the ancient Champa Kingdom ‚Äì as a tribute to the Cham ethnic community with deep roots in the region.

The Five Elements are brought to life through dramatic scenes:

  • Water & Wood: Presented via traditional water puppetry.

  • Earth: Represented by a dance and silk magic act that creates a giant blooming lotus.

  • Fire: Delivered through a thrilling flaming sword act and the rescue of a dancer from a burning cage.

  • Metal: Expressed through a modern fusion of visual effects, flash mob dance, and an elegant √°o d√†i performance.

The Alma Show runs twice every evening at 6:00 PM and 8:00 PM, performed by 24 artists and dancers, including Jacky (Haesung Kim) and B√πi H·ªØu Thi·ªán, under the direction of renowned directors Hyukjin Cho and Terry (Byongkok Jung) of The Stage VN (Vietnam).

  • Mr. Hyukjin Cho previously directed the Dana Show and the opening ceremony of the 2002 FIFA World Cup.

  • Mr. Terry was the general director of the Dreams Come True Magic Tour and the Chuncheon Sky Fairy Festival.

2. Magic & Water Puppetry Show

Meanwhile, the Magic & Water Puppetry Show, running 50 minutes, is performed¬†daily at 3:00 PM.

As the name suggests, the program includes:

  • 30 minutes of traditional water puppetry, performed by 10 puppeteers in a chest-deep water stage.

  • 20 minutes of water-themed magic performances.

This show portrays vivid images of Vietnamese rural life, agriculture, folklore, and legends, expressing deep national pride. Featured stories include:

  • ‚ÄúTh√°nh Gi√≥ng‚Äù ‚Äì the giant boy who rides an iron horse to repel invaders.

  • ‚ÄúL√™ L·ª£i and the Sacred Sword‚Äù ‚Äì about a king gifted a divine sword to save the nation.

The program is directed by Meritorious Artist Nguy·ªÖn Ti·∫øn D≈©ng, World Puppetry Champion (2014) and current Artistic Director of the Vietnam National Puppetry Theater.

Terms & Conditions

1. General Regulations:

  • Please present this e-ticket at the entrance gate for direct access.

  • The ticket is valid for a single use only, at the date and time stated.

  • This is a ticket for a live show. Please double-check the showtime. Arrive at least 15 minutes early and sit in your assigned seat.

  • Tickets are non-refundable, non-cancellable, and non-exchangeable for other services, except in cases of force majeure.

  • Ticket prices include VAT

  • Customers are responsible for safeguarding their QR code and booking reference provided in the ‚ÄúOrder Confirmation.‚Äù We are not liable for any loss due to disclosure of this information.

2. Event Guidelines:

  • Do not bring weapons, explosives, sharp objects, laser lights, flashlights, umbrellas, pens, selfie sticks, or tripods.

  • No illegal substances allowed.

  • No animals or pets allowed.

  • No fireworks or flammable materials permitted.

  • Filming, photographing, or livestreaming the performances in any form is strictly prohibited. Violators may be removed from the event without refund.

  • Do not engage in fights, threats, or any behavior that may harm, endanger, or disturb others.

  • In all circumstances, the organizers' decision is final

Uji Matcha Cheesecake Tarte Workshop

The Uji Matcha Cheesecake Tarte workshop is a delightful and stylish experience, perfect for those who are passionate about baking and love the unique combination of rich matcha flavor and smooth, creamy cheesecake.

Throughout the session, you will be carefully guided on how to make a crispy, fragrant tart crust, along with a silky-smooth matcha cheesecake filling that is not overly sweet but carries the distinctive, refreshing flavor of Uji matcha from Japan. This combination creates a dessert that is both easy to eat and sophisticated, enchanting anyone who loves matcha.

In addition to learning how to make the tart, you'll also be taught tips on selecting high-quality matcha and techniques for achieving the perfect color and flavor for your cake. Especially, you will be guided on creative ways to decorate your tart, from the smooth layers of matcha to the small, beautiful details that complete the delicious and visually stunning dessert.

The workshop is held in a cozy and friendly space, making it the ideal place to freely unleash your creativity, learn new skills, and connect with fellow baking enthusiasts. After the class, you‚Äôll take home your very own Uji Matcha Cheesecake Tarte, ready to enjoy the fresh, amazing flavor of matcha in every layer.

  • Workshop Details:

    üåøDuration: 2 hours
    üåøInstruction language: Vietnamese or English
    üåøFinal product: 1 cake (15cm) with packaging included

    What to Prepare:

    • Participation ticket: Your ticket will be sent via your registered email.

    Workshop Includes:

    • A refreshing homemade drink and snack prepared by the Garden Art kitchen for you to enjoy during the session
    • Your finished " Uji Matcha Cheesecake Tarte", handmade by you
    • Schedule a personalized appointment and request products tailored to your needs

    Parking location: Bach Dang Secondary School, Alley 386 Le Van Sy, Ward 14, District 3
    (Note: Parking fee applies)

    Get ready for an exciting experience where you can unleash your creativity and take home a sweet piece of nature-inspired artistry from Garden Art‚Äôs kitchen!

    (English)


    Snickers Mousse Stick Workshop is a fun and creative experience for those who love sweets and want to explore how to combine the signature flavors of the famous Snickers bar with smooth mousse, creating a unique and irresistible dessert.

    Throughout the session, you will be carefully guided on how to make a smooth chocolate mousse with rich and sweet flavors, combined with layers of caramel and crunchy peanuts ‚Äì the signature ingredients of Snickers. You will learn how to prepare and combine the ingredients in a way that creates a delicate mousse layer while maintaining a perfect balance of flavors.

    In addition, you'll be shown decorating techniques to shape the mousse into sticks resembling mini Snickers bars, with details like a chocolate coating, crunchy peanut pieces, and the signature caramel layer. These shaping and decorating techniques will help your dessert not only taste amazing but also look visually appealing, providing a truly creative experience.

    The workshop takes place in a cozy and friendly space, where you can freely express your creativity, learn baking tips, and connect with fellow baking enthusiasts. After the session, you'll take home your own unique Snickers Mousse Stick, ready to enjoy the delicious flavors of chocolate, caramel, and peanuts.

    This is a great opportunity to try out new baking techniques, while having fun with your creativity and enjoying the results.

    üåø Duration: 2 - 2,5 hours

    üåø Language of Instruction: Vietnamese or English

    üåø End Product: 1 set of 6 pieces (or one whole 14 cm cake), including packaging

    • Workshop Includes:
      • A drink and homemade snacks provided by Garden Art for you to enjoy during the session.
      • The completed Snickers Mousse Stick made by you.
      • Schedule a personalized appointment and request products tailored to your needs

* Workshop N∆∞·ªõc hoa kh√¥: H·ªçc ph√≠ bao g·ªìm 1 ph·∫ßn n∆∞·ªõc, to√†n b·ªô d·ª•ng c·ª•, nguy√™n v·∫≠t li·ªáu t·∫°o ra th√†nh ph·∫ßm 3 h≈© n∆∞·ªõc hoa kh√¥/ M·ªói h≈© 10gr, k√®m h·ªôp v√† t√∫i gi·∫•y mang v·ªÅ.

Body perfume is extracted entirely from natural ingredients, ensuring safety for the skin as well as consumers' health. Flower 1969's organize the Perfume Workshop to provide customers interesting experiences about pure natural scents as well as the uniqueness of individual scents by making their own favourite scents.
The class will go in-depth and learn about the properties and layers of scent, as well as the characteristics of compressed wax perfume, compact, long-lasting and alcohol-free - A new perfume product in the Vietnamese market. . (English)

The "Hoa Trong L√≤ng" embroidery workshop is a serene space where each needle, thread, and stitch carries a story and a deep emotion from the heart. With a name as gentle as an invitation into a world of tranquility and creativity, this workshop is for those who cherish the art of embroidery and seek peaceful moments to freely express their soul through beautiful embroidered flowers.

In "Hoa Trong L√≤ng," participants will be carefully guided from the basics of embroidery to more intricate techniques, capturing the essence of flowers and nature. These may be vibrant blossoms blooming on soft fabric or delicate, subtle images crafted with skilled stitches. In each stitch, it‚Äôs not just about craftsmanship but the connection between the embroiderer‚Äôs spirit and the beauty around them, making every flower not just a work of art but an expression of genuine feelings from within.

Here, the hustle and bustle of life seem to fade away, allowing each participant to listen to their own heart and find peace in every stitch, as if gently whispering their innermost emotions to the flowers they create.

    The workshop includes:

    • Your finished artwork with a gift box, making it perfect for gifting
    • Materials and supplies provided
    • Schedule a personalized appointment and request products tailored to your needs

    ¬†

¬†

Event Introduction

After 7 years, the legendary singer Thomas Anders of Modern Talking will reunite with Vietnamese audiences, promising to bring fans back to the vivid memories of the 80s with timeless songs like ‚ÄúCheri Cheri Lady‚Äù, ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre My Heart, You‚Äôre My Soul‚Äù,... The intertwined notes of Modern Talking have touched the souls of generations of Vietnamese, making every heart beat when the familiar melodies resonate.

The special International Concert event, themed "Melody of Two Nations," is organized to celebrate the 50th anniversary of Vietnam-Germany diplomatic relations in 2025. Along with performances by international legends and talented Vietnamese-German artists, the "Melody of Two Nations" International Concert will bring a fresh musical experience.

Tuimi - The rose of R&B Soul music, bringing contemporary melodies full of emotion and passion.

Lam Vissay - The heartthrob who draw attention with his role in "Red Rain," possesses a powerful voice expected to bring a fresh color to the show.

This is not just a concert but also a cultural bridge between Vietnam and Germany, offering a unique artistic experience that audiences cannot miss.

Sakura Blossom White Chocolate Mousse Cake Workshop - Garden Art

The Sakura Blossom White Chocolate Mousse Cake workshop is a fun and creative experience for those who love baking and want to explore the delightful combination of the sweet taste of white chocolate and the refreshing essence of cherry blossoms.

You will be carefully guided step-by-step to create a smooth mousse cake, with a soft and fragrant white chocolate mousse filling. The special feature of this cake is its cherry blossom flavor, which adds a pure, delicate fragrance, evoking the essence of spring. You will also learn how to make a cherry blossom gel for decoration, creating soft, elegant lines to adorn your cake.

The workshop takes place in a warm and welcoming environment, where you can freely unleash your creativity and connect with other baking enthusiasts. Upon completion, you‚Äôll take home your own Sakura Blossom White Chocolate Mousse Cake, full of the fresh, springtime flavor üå∏

  • Workshop Details:

    üåøDuration: 2 - 2,5 hours
    üåøInstruction language: Vietnamese or English
    üåøFinal product: 1 cake (14cm) with packaging included

    What to Prepare:

    • Participation ticket: Your ticket will be sent via your registered email.

    Workshop Includes:

    • A refreshing homemade drink and snack prepared by the Garden Art kitchen for you to enjoy during the session
    • Your finished "Sakura Blossom White Chocolate Mousse Cake", handmade by you
    • Exclusive recipe from Garden Art
    • Schedule a personalized appointment and request products tailored to your needs

    Parking location: Bach Dang Secondary School, Alley 386 Le Van Sy, Ward 14, District 3
    (Note: Parking fee applies)

    Get ready for an exciting experience where you can unleash your creativity and take home a sweet piece of nature-inspired artistry from Garden Art‚Äôs kitchen!
